name: macos_shell
description: Execute a shell command in a secure macOS sandbox (no network, limited file access).

name: codex_sdk
description: Run a task using the OpenAI Codex SDK (uses Codex login or API key).

prompt.description: The user prompt or task for Codex.

model.description: Codex model name (optional, default uses Codex config).

threadId.description: Existing Codex thread ID to resume (optional).
Thread ID for follow-up Codex runs.

name: claude_code_sdk
description: Run a task using the Claude Code (Claude Agent) SDK (subscription or API key).

prompt.description: The task prompt for Claude Code.

model.description: Claude model name (optional, default uses Claude Code config).

maxTurns.description: Maximum turns the agent can take (optional).

systemPrompt.description: System prompt to steer Claude Code behavior (optional).

allowedTools.description: Restrict tools Claude Code can use (optional, e.g. ['Bash','Read','Write']).

cwd.description: Working directory for Claude Code execution (optional).

completion.description: The final response from Claude Code.

name: read_csv
description: Read a CSV file from local disk and return its contents as JSON records.

filePath.description: Path to the CSV file to read.

data.description: Array of records (objects) from the CSV, one per row.

name: read_json
description: Read a JSON file from local disk and return its parsed contents.

filePath.description: Path to the JSON file to read.

data.description: Parsed JSON content (could be object or array).

name: read_markdown
description: Read a Markdown (.md) file and return its text content.

filePath.description: Path to the Markdown file to read.

content.description: The raw text content of the Markdown file.

name: read_pdf
description: Read a PDF file and extract its text content for analysis.

filePath.description: Path to the PDF file to read.

content.description: The extracted text content of the PDF.
